labels.stored_period: History of previous application, completed or incomplete, will be kept in your vault for 7 days. You can search keyword(s) e.g. customer name, etc to retrieve a previous Lead.

customer.title: Customer Details
customer.subtitle: Provide contact details of your customer so that we can send him/her an online application that can be completed between 2 to 3 minutes.

labels.pdpa_clause:
By submitting this referral:

1. I acknowledge that the submission of this referral and its receipt by UOB does not mean that UOB has approved this referral or its underlying loan application. UOB reserves the right to reject any referral and the underlying loan application without assigning any reason whatsoever.

2. Submission of this referral does not entitle me to any commission or other payment from UOB or the loan applicant, regardless of whether or not the underlying loan application is approved, in the absence of a separate agreement with UOB in relation to referral payments

3. I confirm that all information submitted by me in connection with this referral is true, accurate and complete and I will inform UOB in writing of any amendments to such information.

4. I hereby consent to the disclosure and use of information provided in this referral or in connection herewith, (i) by UOB for the purposes of the underlying loan application and any referral arrangements, and (ii) to and between any branch, agency, representative office or related corporation of UOB and their respective officers, servants or agents, whether in Singapore or elsewhere, whom UOB consider necessary in order to process this referral.

5. I represent and warrant to UOB that I have the consent of the person(s) whose personal data I have submitted to disclose their personal data for UOB's collection, use and disclosure for the purposes of the underlying loan application, including communication via any of the contact details provided.

thankYouPage.application_description: UOB has initiated this Home Loan application. We have sent an email with a hyperlink to the customer for him/her to start applying. There has been a recent spate of phishing scams targeting government and banks' customers. It is important to remain vigilant and be suspicious of all unsolicited or unexpected emails he/she receives. Do advise your customer to make sure that he/she sees the correct Agent and Agency on the email before proceeding. Also, as an additional precaution, remind him/her to check the URL of any site that he/she is being directed to and make sure it's an official UOB website - https://forms.uob.com.sg. Your customer can start the application by signing in to SingPass to retrieve his/her personal information with MyInfo. There is no need to provide the bank with a physical copy of NRIC or any income documents.
